title: Riot merch 85 dollar jackets... 25$ mini figures...
body:
Made of plastic...

New champion skins costing more then the old 975 rp ones... a lot costing 1350 rp and not even being legendary.........

70 Ip for winning a game that takes 35-40 minutes... Champions costing 7300-6000 ip....

Anyone seeing the pattern here?
 
Yet riot fanboys be like " game is free to play"  " I have most champions and I've only played X amount "   " Skins are only cosmetic so it's okay most of them cost like 15$ now, that's fine."

"Riot sells quality skins and products that people enjoy so it's okay to be expensive."

"You get first win of day and it's a whopping 150 ip so you can get 6800 ip champs in like 2 days brah"

Yeah, no guys. You're wrong. Sorry brahs... Time to open your eyes.

Inb4 random gd'ers downvote me. 
Btw, if you downvote me you're admitting I'm right. That's the TOS for hitting that button on this. Because I am right. So I like it when people agree with me.
